TopicTitle: Whole fairing part detached with everything in it, please help.

Articles.Content:
The whole fairing part detached with everything in it on launch when the physics engine loaded, how to fix it?

Also i installed the following mods :

 - Community Resource Pack,

 - Kerbalism,

 - Kerbal Engineer Redux,

 - Trajectories.

Please help,

Thanks.

I had the same thing happening to me recently. Attaching the fairing with a set of four struts to the (3.75m) tank below solved the issue in true Kerbal (moar struts) fashion. Of your mod list, the only overlap I have is Kerbal Engineer but I find it hard to believe KER is to blame for this problem, so it's likely more a "stock" problem. Also, 1.2 is supposed to have "gravity easing" when a new craft is instanciated on the launch, hopefully that'll fix it. Or not
